Evocation 9

Chain Lightning

range [rng_bat]: 25

Chaining Damage:5+
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Shock [shock], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The mage hurls three orbs of pure lightning towards the enemies. Where an orb lands a lightning will strike a nearby unit and continue to travel to other nearby units until it eventually dissipates.
